talk.title: Multilingual Text Mining: Lost in Translation, Found in Native Language Mining

class.title: Advanced Information Retrieval
class.description: This course will explore various aspects of text, web and social media mining; the emphasis will be on a data science approach combining various techniques to develop solutions to problems involving social media data. The course begins with some fundamentals on data mining followed by recommender systems (algorithms powering Amazon, Facebook and Twitter). This is followed by a discussion of several topics in content mining, including entity tagging, topic models, and information extraction. The last segment focuses on graph mining techniques suitable for analyzing social networks. Lectures will include case studies of successfully implemented solutions.
